title: Gab (social network)
summary: Gab is an American alt-tech social networking service known for its far-right userbase.[2] Widely described as a haven for extremists including neo-Nazis, white supremacists, white nationalists, the alt-right, and QAnon conspiracy theorists,[3][4] it has attracted users and groups who have been banned from other social media platforms and users seeking alternatives to mainstream social media platforms.[5]
